entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 10:07 PM MST Tuesday 14 March 2023
